entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
